name: Ghost Trap
description:
GHOST TRAP is a free-to-play indie platformer created by a solo student developer.

-10 levels
-3 bosses
-original soundtrack & sfx created by developer

If you would like to support the game, please purchase the soundtrack.

*Xbox controller recommended when using a gamepad. Other controllers will work, however the face buttons (A/B/X/Y) may be mapped differently.
*Keyboard controls available
*Achievements, and additional functionality planned for future updates*
